description: This is a Flutter application's main Dart file that sets up the primary app widget, a home page with a scaffold, app bar, centered column, text, and progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with title property.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building the UI with Scaffold, AppBar, and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, calling runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
